summary: Add 12 new enchanmnet which make your weapons totally different!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Impact][size=6][color=darkorange][b]Alex Mysterious Enchantment[/b][/color][/size][/font]

  Do you think it should be different when weapons get enchantment? Do you think the vanilla enchantment effects are so boring? If you think so, you can take a look at Alex Mysterious Enchantment.

  Over 10 kinds of different magic effect was made as different kinds of enchantment whick can free enchant to any weapon, make weapons glowing and fancy.
  It would not change any vanilla enchantment.

[b][color=darkorange]How to use[/color][/b]:
get original weapons(console):
player.additem xx00538f 1
player.additem xx001d9e 1
player.additem xx00538c 1
player.additem xx00332d 1
player.additem xx000d63 1
player.additem xx001d94 1
player.additem xx0058fd 1
player.additem xx0048c0 1
player.additem xx001d96 1
player.additem xx0058f8 1
player.additem xx000d62 1
player.additem xx001d98 1

And you can Learn it.

[b]Permission[/b]:
Open source, you must open your mod source if you use my mod to make.
I think it is a good idea, but I am not good at model modding. So I hope there is anyone else to make it better.

Thanks to Bethesda for perfect game!
author: alex891006
